name: Dark Onirisme
description:
Do you want to make your life your greatest dream ?

"The 'ONIRISME 3000' is about to be available to everyone. This science  piece of work is going to let you leave your sad reality and join your most beautiful dreams... or your darkest fantasies. However, the 'ONIRISME 3000' just need to go through some tests before being sold... Be patient, it's just for tomorrow ! "

Three children wake up in a strange place where everything is just nonsense... They don't remember why they're here but they know that they have to find a way out... Indeed, many dangers are lurking in the darkness.

Multiple gameplay phases !

Dark Onirisme is a visual novel, created for the NaNoRenO 2021, with at some points: puzzle and point and click parts.

Credits:

Story, art (sprites, UI & CG) and code: Overtired_FOX

music/sound effects from: www.zapsplat.com
